item.title: (BETA) How to build a website with Hugo
item.description: !!! UNDER CONSTRUCTION !!! Link to heading This is a concise, step-by-step guide on how to build a website - just like this one - with Hugo, and deploy/host it on Github Pages. Follow the hyperlinks for a quick explanation on each component. Prerequisites/installations Link to heading Have Hugo - the extended version - on your computer (install from: https://gohugo.io/installation/) Hugo is a website generator framework written in Go (a computer language).
